problem_text_cn: 如图,在△ABC中,∠ACB=45°,AD⊥BC于点D,点E为AD上一点,连接CE,CE=AB,若∠ACE=20°,则∠B的度数为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠ACB = N_0, AD ⊥ BC is at point D, point E is a point on AD, connected to CE, CE = AB, if ∠ACE = N_1, then the degree of ∠B is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵AD⊥BC,∠ACB=45,∴△ADC是等腰直角三角形,∴AD=CD,∠CAE=∠ACD=45°,在Rt△ABD与Rt△CED中≥ft\lbrace\begin{array}{l}{AD=CD}\\{AB=CE}\end{array}\right.,∴Rt△ABD≌Rt△CED(HL),∴∠B=∠DEC,∵∠DEC=∠CAE+∠ACE=45°+20°=65°,∴∠B=65°故选:B.
raw_comment: 本题考查了等腰直角三角形的性质,全等三角形的判定和性质,三角形的外角的性质,熟练掌握等腰直角三角形的性质是解题的关键
